author: Allyson Chiu
title: Coronavirus-wracked nursing home evacuated after most of staff failed to show for two days - Washington Post
description: Coronavirus-wracked nursing home evacuated after most of staff failed to show for two days Washington Post Riverside Nursing Home Evacuated After Staff Doesn't Show Up A 2nd Day In A Row CBS Los Angeles A California nursing home was evacuated after its staff …
content: At the time of the evacuation, the center was looking after more than 80 patients, 34 of whom have tested positive for the coronavirus, Riverside County Public Health Officer Cameron Kaiser said at a news conference. Five employees have also contracted the vi… [+4086 chars]
